title: Designing Responsibility-Based Language Learning Experiences for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Comprehension and Application Skills
context.additional_context: Learners, as working professionals, require flexible learning hours and can utilize digital devices for their learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans within eight weeks
Learners write reflective journals incorporating peer feedback at least three times during the language learning process
Learners orally present learning content with over 70% accuracy in final presentations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
